name: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Presidential Security
name_original: Road Hero Speed Car Racing Presidential Security
description:
Road Hero Speed Car Racing Presidential Security is an arcade racing game. 

Drive  President's car through superbly stunning roads, collect coins, avoid traffic cars.

KEY FEATURES OF ROAD HERO SPEED CAR RACING PRESIDENTIAL SECURITY-

- Easy intuitive gameplay! - Interesting Story! - Lots of Coins to collect! - Avoid Collisions with traffic!  - Race through exciting tracks! - Experience thrilling audio and visual effects!

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to steer the vehicle.

Up to accelerate the vehicle.

Enter to Pause and to Un-Pause the game.
